name: HanumanChalisa
0:
”Alexa open Hanuman Chalisa”
”Alexa play Hanuman Chalisa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hanuman chalisa
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Hanuman Chalisa is a Hindu devotional hymn addressed to Lord Hanuman. It is traditionally believed to have been authored by 16th-century poet Tulsidas in the Awadhi language, and is his best known text apart from the Ramcharitmanas

You can simply play saying "Alexa play Hanuman Chalisa".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
